tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
As always Dr Hetal's friendliness and confidence in her ability is inspiring. This is reflected in the excellent repair work she has done on my teeth. That is the reason I and my family members have continued with her from the inspection of her practice in Santacruz clinic .
I do and will continue to recommend her to my friends and relatives.
I wish her all the success.
With blessings
Bhadresh Patel

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Hetal is kind and patient even with a 40-something patient who has a phobia of needles. Never in my life have I gotten an injection in my mouth with so little pain and so much patience - I‚Äôm still in disbelief about how gently she injected the anesthesia. The clinic is super clean and the dentists assistants and junior dentists and Sanjana (the receptionist and assistant) are all super friendly and help alleviate the stress of going to the dentist. Dr Hetal‚Äôs husband, Dr Jignesh Kothari, did my Invisalign treatment and he is as amazing and kind and professional as Dr Hetal.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: so my husband has been having tooth ache and when the doctor checked all they had to tell is there is alignment issue and while the doctor was telling another guy was ready with the box to show us the braces which cost around 1.9 lakhs. ** *** **** ******* ** ********* ** *** ****** **** ****** **** **** ** * **** They referred us to some other place for x ray. We showed it to another doctor *** ** *** * *** ** *** ********** ***** **** ** *** ******* *** ** *** ******* ** ** **** ********** The main doctor didn't even check he just stood and told he needs braces. * **** **** ******* ******* **** **** ******** *** *** *** ********** ******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
This was my 2nd implant and the experience was even more awe inspiring. No ache at all, such that I stopped taking pain killers from the 2nd day. The entire process was smooth, well aided by Dr Hetal's calm approach and comforting words during and after the treatment.

Dr Hetal and her entire team are like family and I trust them completely.  A special shout out to her assistants Vasant and Sankalp whose hands also work like clock work and the administrator Ms Sanjana - ever so polite and efficient.

All the very best to Dr Hetal and Jignesh Kothari always.

Warm regards 
Pranav Sata 

I would surely recommend her and Dr Jignesh for any kind of dental treatment.

Thanks 

Vasant, Sankalp and Sanjana

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

review: The doctor explained the treatment to me clearly, answered all my questions, and was very comforting as I was worried about pain. They assured me it would not hurt and it didn't. Everytime I needed a break the doctor immediately allowed me one, making the treatment a comfortable one. Further treatment too was explained and all questions answered. For the first time I'm not dreading going in for my root canal next week!
